pageContext.other: Uncertain on Geolocation accuracy, may be N. Bovey on card instead of Nr., also Bovey (Bovey Tracy?) does not appear to be near Week., 2 cross section drawings of palstave on reverse, Angular shield device below stop., Lateral blade bevel (possibly ridge?) on both sides., Large rectangular portion of edge and part of blade missing, small crack extending into extant portion of edge/blade., Wings very wide at stop and taper quickly about halfway through septum toward butt.
pageContext.site: England,  devonshire, nr. bovey., week, sx 7186
pageContext.remarks: Found "buried beneath a very old hedge or barrier"
